content:
Hi!

I just finished my pset 2. When I was trying the test file, it kept asking me for a letter input, and there's no end of it. And after running the tester file, I cannot run my hangman file properly. It's showed as below. Would you be able to explain what's going on here?
subject: pset 2 test file issue

content:
It’s hard to tell what the problem is just by looking at this. I’d recommend trying to restart the kernel, and if that doesn’t work, try office hours next week

Edit: if it’s constantly asking for an input, you might have an infinite loop (check the condition in your while loop). And use Ctrl+C or Cmd+C to manually exit those
